quote: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: For it is in giving that we receive.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Christmas is joy, religious joy, an inner joy of light and peace.
name: Pope Francis

quote: Maybe Christmas, the Grinch thought, doesn't come from a store.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling.
name: Edna Ferber

quote: And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: I will honor Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.
name: Roy L. Smith

quote: Every gift which is given, even though it be small, is in reality great, if it is given with affection.
name: Pindar

quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
name: Dale Evans

quote: Let's be naughty and save Santa the trip.
name: Gary Allan

quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
name: Alexander Smith

quote: Santa Claus has the right idea - visit people only once a year.
name: Victor Borge

quote: It is a fine seasoning for joy to think of those we love.
name: Moliere

quote: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
name: George Carlin

quote: Christmas and the holidays are the season of giving. It's a time when people are more kind and open-hearted.
name: Gisele Bundchen

quote: The excellence of a gift lies in its appropriateness rather than in its value.
name: Charles Dudley Warner

quote: There would be no Christmas if there was no Easter.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Nothing says holidays, like a cheese log.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
name: Bob Hope

quote: Christmas makes me happy no matter what time of year it comes around.
name: Bryan White

quote: Expectancy is the atmosphere for miracles.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Christmas... is not an external event at all, but a piece of one's home that one carries in one's heart.
name: Freya Stark

quote: Christmas is a stocking stuffed with sugary goodness.
name: Mo Rocca

quote: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school.
name: Alice Cooper

quote: I once wanted to become an atheist, but I gave up - they have no holidays.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: I just think Christmas is a time to embrace all the naughty little things.
name: Jade Thirlwall

quote: Mail your packages early so the post office can lose them in time for Christmas.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: At Christmas play and make good cheer, for Christmas comes but once a year.
name: Thomas Tusser

quote: Christmas, children, is not a date. It is a state of mind.
name: Mary Ellen Chase

quote: Unless we make Christmas an occasion to share our blessings, all the snow in Alaska won't make it 'white'.
name: Bing Crosby

quote: Christmas is, of course, the time to be home - in heart as well as body.
name: Garry Moore

quote: God is in the details.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: I wanted an electric train for Christmas but I got the saxophone instead.
name: Clarence Clemons

quote: I beg to present you as a Christmas gift the city of Savannah.
name: William Tecumseh Sherman

quote: What I don't like about office Christmas parties is looking for a job the next day.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: For many, Christmas is also a time for coming together. But for others, service will come first.
name: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: That's the true spirit of Christmas; people being helped by people other than me.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: My Christmases have always just been very simple and about family.
name: Julie Roberts

quote: A good conscience is a continual Christmas.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There's nothing sadder in this world than to awake Christmas morning and not be a child.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: I like the idea of putting your Christmas wish list up and letting people share it.
name: Bill Gates

quote: I love Christmas. Christmas is family time.
name: Brody Jenner

quote: One thing I love about Christmas music is that it has a tradition of warmth.
name: Zooey Deschanel

quote: On the whole, I prefer Christmas as an adult than I did as a child.
name: Nigella Lawson

quote: Pets, like their owners, tend to expand a little over the Christmas period.
name: Frances Wright

quote: Christmas in L.A. is weird. There's no snow. It's not even cold.
name: Ellie Goulding

quote: What I love about Christmas music is it stays around every year and comes back.
name: India Arie

quote: Christmas is always the most fun. I start looking forward to Christmas before it's even summertime.
name: Mariah Carey

quote: I didn't know the full dimensions of forever, but I knew it was longer than waiting for Christmas to come.

quote: My fondest memories are generally the day after Thanksgiving. I get the total decorating Christmas itch.
name: Katharine McPhee

quote: I think Christmas is about celebration and come on, on the inside everyone wants to dance.
name: TobyMac

quote: Don't give me books for Christmas; I already have a book.
name: Jean Harlow

name: Christina Tosi

quote: Christmas is over and Business is Business.
name: Franklin Pierce Adams

quote: Christmas is a holiday that persecutes the lonely, the frayed, and the rejected.
name: Jimmy Cannon

quote: I love singing Christmas carols. I know every harmony to every music-hall Christmas song.
name: Zooey Deschanel

quote: A simplified Christmas isn't about circumstances as much as it is about focus.

quote: A typical Christmas is me shucking oysters. I love them and I always get them in at Christmas.

quote: My mom loved my Christmas music, so I did an awful lot of it!

quote: For me, hearing my voice is sometimes a little nauseating, especially at Christmas.

quote: I am Jewish, but I love Christmas, as most Jews with any taste do, because Hanukkah is lame.

quote: Halloween starts earlier and earlier, just like Christmas.

quote: Even though we're a week and a half away from Thanksgiving, it's beginning to look a lot like Christmas.

quote: I love Halloween. I love Thanksgiving. I love Christmas. I love New Year's.

quote: I built my church on Easter services, Christmas Eve services, and Norman Vincent Peale.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: My early business ventures included growing Christmas trees and breeding birds.
name: Richard Branson

quote: T'was the night before Christmas, when all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
name: Clement Clarke Moore

quote: Christmas is a time of year that's so romantic.
name: Katharine McPhee

quote: That is what Christmas should be about, I think - togetherness and playfulness. It's like a game.

quote: I like to spend Christmas with family and friends, pigging out, exchanging gifts and basically doing nothing.
name: George Kotsiopoulos

quote: There's never really been a real hood Christmas movie.

quote: Online, there's no time. It's always Christmas.

name: Stephen Fry

quote: Making your Christmas cake in September is perfect, as too fresh a cake crumbles when cut.

quote: People say I don't write books, I make Christmas presents.

quote: Christmas is cheery for some people and depressing for others.
name: Mark Kozelek

quote: I think my ideal Christmas would be to hang out with my mates.
name: Jodie Whittaker

quote: Growing up, my earliest memories are listening to Sinatra Christmas albums.

quote: To perceive Christmas through its wrappings becomes more difficult with every year.

quote: Christmas makes everything twice as sad.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: I beg people not to accept the seasonal ritual of well-timed charity on Christmas Eve. It's blasphemy.

quote: I don't know if anybody's ever ready for another award season. It's kind of like Christmas.

quote: Christmas is a great time to recommit to each other and our communities.
name: James Lankford

quote: Every singer eventually gets around to a Christmas disc.
name: Renee Fleming

name: Jerry Falwell

quote: Fashion Week is like Christmas.

quote: I think Father Christmas is real because the belief is real. The belief becomes the reality.

quote: I'm not going to tell you to meditate on what Christmas really means and be thankful.

quote: A Christian's celebration of Christmas should be a lot different from that of nonbelievers.

quote: I write seven days a week, starting at 4 o'clock in the morning, including Christmas.

quote: I'm like everybody: I gain the Christmas 10 or so, and then I try to exercise more and dial it back.

quote: In France, Christmas is a family holiday. You stay home. New Year's Eve is when you go out.

quote: I absolutely adore Christmas.
name: Aurora

quote: My grandson sees me as Lois on TV every Christmas, and that scores me points.

quote: I save every Christmas card. I keep them all.
